title: FPS
body: So when I go into games every 6 seconds my fps would go to 120 to 12 then back to 120 but another 6 seconds it will go back to 12 then back to 120 I tried restarting my pc and task manager tweaks but still nothing does anyone know how to fix {{item:3070}} Riot

replies.body:
Framerate issues can be caused by a number of different potential factors. By far, the most common culprits for these issues tend to be display driver or hardware issues. Our [**Framerate Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) will get you on track with the right steps to approach this issue.

If you continue to see these issues, let me know.
